question.para: Glibc fails with "ld.map: No such file or directory".

answer.para: You're missing /dev/null. Either you forgot to create it when the glibc build instructions say to, or you're using devfs and forgot to "mount --bind /dev $LFS/dev" before chrooting. You may have to delete and recreate the glibc-N.N.N and glibc-build directories after fixing that.
